skills.name: Blade Ward
skills.description: [SP: 18][CD: 25s] Summons an ethereal blade barrier for all allies (including illusions), increasing their DEF by 50%. Enemies hit by the blade take 320 Lightning DMG every 0.25s for 6.00s.

skills.name: Storm Raven
skills.description: 40% chance of reducing direct or indirect DMG taken by 600 (indirect DMG: ignited, bleeding, etc.).
